https://tmrev.io/movie/222625-3.11: Surviving Japan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null True story of an American volunteer who discovered the unvarnished truth about the Fukushima nuclear disaster cover-up while living in Japan. A critical look at how the authorities handled the nuclear crisis and Tsunami relief by an American who volunteered in the clean-up. 3.11: Surviving Japan
